definition: ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
genius comes from hard effort/Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration (Thomas Edison)
pinyin: tian1 cai2 chu1 zi4 qin2 fen4

sentences.english: Gifted children can appear to have the same behaviours as those with Asperger's.
sentences.chinese: 天才兒童會出現一些與亞斯普傑氏症候羣相同的行爲。

sentences.english: The judge stayed the sentence until the following day.
sentences.chinese: 法官把判決拖德溱二天才宣讀。

sentences.english: Even non-school days, they would have little success.
sentences.chinese: 即便是天才不學，也不會有多大的成就。

sentences.english: “There’s a lot of talent here,” Diop said.
There is money to be made (indirectly for the creatives) by finding talent.
sentences.chinese: 發現天才就是生財之道。

sentences.english: There are few people who may be described as geniuses.
sentences.chinese: 很少有能稱得上天才的人。

sentences.english: Even the big brains at Google are stumped.
sentences.chinese: 即使是谷歌的天才們也被難住了。

sentences.english: Thanks to the many talented people who have shared their recipes with us.
sentences.chinese: 在此還要感謝曾經與我們分享這些原創食譜的天才們。

sentences.english: Arnesen has been given the role of head talent scout, in charge of uncovering football talents.
sentences.chinese: 阿內森被任命爲球探總管，負責發掘足球天才。

sentences.english: A - Hi, I heard you are a talented Classical musician.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，我聽說你是天才的古典音樂家。

sentences.english: Philip is a phenomenon in math. He always gets 100% on tests.
sentences.chinese: 非利普是個數學天才，他總是在測驗時獲滿分。

sentences.english: Aphorisms are essentially an aristocratic genre of writing.
sentences.chinese: 格言本質上是天才般的寫作。

sentences.english: How do you manage to instil teamwork in a squad packed with great individual talents?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎樣讓一羣天才球員凝結成一支冠軍團隊的？

sentences.english: You can't expect the "talent" to travel to the back end of nowhere, I suppose.
sentences.chinese: 我們似乎不能認爲這個“天才”講得都是無稽之談。

sentences.english: The child has musical talent [a gift for music].
In nearby Indore the ration is half an hour's supply every seven days.
sentences.chinese: 在鄰近的印多爾則每7天才有一次半小時的供水。
